2.3.1 #Logic.Functions.c c

Calls a color value from the colors map. Used to create a terse, yet managed system of color declarations.

Parameters:
  • $color-name
    The name of the color value you want to use. See TODO: link this
  • $color-variant
    Optionally calls a sub-color. Used for colors organized by component.
Source: logic/_functions.c.scss, line 1
